Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~n/etswni n~te peklaoc: e~akjempousini qen hannai nem hanmetsenh/t matal[wou.
Remember, O Lord, the sick of Your people; You have visited them with mercies and compassion; heal them.
